name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】歌に謎解きにホラーあり！？こよりらしさを詰め込んだライブ！ - THE KOYORI - 【 #博衣こより1周年 ⧸ホロライブ】 [aLgQxWOWEnw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: MC section in the laboratory. Koyori talks to the audience (Assistant-kun) while wearing handcuffs and notices a guitar.
Performance of the song 'Lost my music'.

subtitles.original: 負けました。
subtitles.english: I lost.

subtitles.original: 助手くん、マジで不安だったんだよ。
subtitles.english: Assistant-kun, I was really worried.

subtitles.original: 不安だったんだよ。
subtitles.english: I was worried.

subtitles.original: 手錠よかったのに、あ、つけられたかな？つけられましたか？
subtitles.english: The handcuffs were fine, oh, were they put on? Were they?

subtitles.original: ついたー！やったー！やったぜ！
subtitles.english: They're on! Yay! I did it!

subtitles.original: これを撮るために今頑張ってたんだ。
subtitles.english: I was working hard just to take this.

subtitles.original: あ、どう、どうかな、助手くん？
subtitles.english: Ah, how, how is it, Assistant-kun?

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと、ちょっと下から煽りとか...
subtitles.english: Ah, maybe a little, a little from a low angle...

subtitles.original: え、待って、なんかギターある！
subtitles.english: Wait, there's a guitar!

subtitles.original: 今気づいた、今気づいた！ギターあります、ギター！
subtitles.english: I just noticed, I just noticed! There's a guitar, a guitar!

subtitles.original: おもっ！ありました、ギター！
subtitles.english: Heavy! There it is, a guitar!

subtitles.original: じゃあこれを使って、歌を歌うってことですね。
subtitles.english: So that means I'm going to use this to sing.

subtitles.original: これヒントだったってことだ。なるほどなー。
subtitles.english: It was a hint. I see.

subtitles.original: おも、おもちゃんです、おもちゃんです。
subtitles.english: Heavy, it's heavy-chan, heavy-chan.

subtitles.original: え、じゃあ何、どういうのがいい？
subtitles.english: Well, so what, what's good?

subtitles.original: 繋がってない... 繋がってる！見て見て！
subtitles.english: It's not connected... it is! Look, look!

subtitles.original: こんなに細いので繋がってるでしょ。
subtitles.english: It's connected with such a thin thing.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと繋がってるでしょ。助手くんに捕らわれちゃったー。
subtitles.english: It's properly connected. I've been captured by Assistant-kun.

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしい...
subtitles.english: Embarrassing...

subtitles.original: どうして助手くん、こよりに手錠なんてつけるの？
subtitles.english: Why, Assistant-kun, are you putting handcuffs on Koyori?

subtitles.original: ねえ...
subtitles.english: Hey...

subtitles.original: 早くライブしろ？
subtitles.english: Hurry up and perform?

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: さあ、じゃあせっかく曲も分かり...
subtitles.english: Well then, since I know the songs...

subtitles.original: 曲はね、まだみんなには分かってないと思うんだけど、
subtitles.english: I don't think everyone knows them yet, but

subtitles.original: こよりの頭の中にはこれを歌おうってやつがもう浮かんでるの。
subtitles.english: the songs I'm going to sing are already in my head.

subtitles.original: その3曲を歌いたいと思います！
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing those three songs!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ早速、歌いに行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's go sing right away!

subtitles.original: あ、道中でこの手錠は外す！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll take off these handcuffs on the way!

subtitles.original: Lost my music
subtitles.english: Lost my music

subtitles.original: さあライブパート行くよー！
subtitles.english: Now, the live part is starting!

subtitles.original: みんな一生懸命歌うから聴いてください！
subtitles.english: I'll sing my heart out, so please listen!

subtitles.original: Lost my music!
subtitles.english: Lost my music!

subtitles.original: 星空見上げ
subtitles.english: Looking up at the starry sky

subtitles.original: 私だけのヒカリ教えて
subtitles.english: Show me my own light

subtitles.original: あなたはいまどこで
subtitles.english: Where are you now

subtitles.original: 誰といるのでしょう？
subtitles.english: and with whom are you?

subtitles.original: 楽しくしてる コト想うと
subtitles.english: When I think about you having fun

subtitles.original: さみしくなって
subtitles.english: I feel lonely

subtitles.original: 一緒に観たシネマ
subtitles.english: The movie we watched together

subtitles.original: ひとりきりで流す
subtitles.english: I'm playing it all alone

subtitles.original: 大好きなひとが遠い
subtitles.english: The person I love is far away

subtitles.original: 遠すぎて泣きたくなるの
subtitles.english: So far I want to cry

subtitles.original: あした目が覚めたら
subtitles.english: When I wake up tomorrow

subtitles.original: ほら 希望が生まれるかも Good night!
subtitles.english: Look, maybe hope will be born. Good night!

subtitles.original: I still, I still I love you.
subtitles.english: I still, I still I love you.

subtitles.original: I'm waiting, waiting forever.
subtitles.english: I'm waiting, waiting forever.

subtitles.original: I still, I still I love you.
subtitles.english: I still, I still I love you.

subtitles.original: とまらないのよ
subtitles.english: It doesn't stop

subtitles.original: No!
subtitles.english: No!

subtitles.original: 眠りのふちで
subtitles.english: On the edge of sleep

subtitles.original: ユメがくれる 思い出の One day
subtitles.english: A dream gives me a one-day memory

subtitles.original: あなたの言葉には
subtitles.english: In your words

subtitles.original: 少しウソがあった
subtitles.english: There was a little lie

subtitles.original: 離さないよと 言っただけで
subtitles.english: You only said "I won't let go"

subtitles.original: 抱きしめたのに
subtitles.english: And hugged me...

subtitles.original: 約束がフワリと
subtitles.english: The promise softly

subtitles.original: 暗い夜に消えた
subtitles.english: Vanished into the dark night

subtitles.original: 大好きなひとよ いつも
subtitles.english: The person I love, I'll always

subtitles.original: いつまでも探してしまう
subtitles.english: Always be looking for you

subtitles.original: きっと目が覚めても
subtitles.english: Surely even when I wake up

subtitles.original: まだ マボロシ感じたい Morning
subtitles.english: I want to feel the illusion still. Morning

subtitles.original: I lost, I lost, I lost you.
subtitles.english: I lost, I lost, I lost you.

subtitles.original: You're making, making my music.
subtitles.english: You're making, making my music.

subtitles.original: I lost, I lost, I lost you.
subtitles.english: I lost, I lost, I lost you.

subtitles.original: もう癒えないの？ No!
subtitles.english: Can I not be healed anymore? No!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！もっともっと声出せるんじゃないのー？
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Can't you give me even more voice?

subtitles.original: いっぱい盛り上がっていってねー！
subtitles.english: Have a lot of fun!

subtitles.original: 大好きなひとが遠い
subtitles.english: The person I love is far away

subtitles.original: 遠すぎて泣きたくなるの
subtitles.english: So far I want to cry

subtitles.original: あした目が覚めたら
subtitles.english: When I wake up tomorrow

subtitles.original: ほら 希望が生まれるかも...
subtitles.english: Look, maybe hope will be born...
